sentences.en: Babies have gristle in some parts of the skull.
sentences.cn: 婴儿的脑壳有些部分是软骨.

sentences.en: He can’t seem to get it into his skull that I’m just not interested in him.
sentences.cn: 他这个笨蛋好像无法明白我根本对他不感兴趣。

sentences.en: He cradled the baby in his arms, his hands cupping her tiny skull.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地抱着婴儿，双手托着她的小脑袋。

sentences.en: He died in the car collision with his skull fractured.
sentences.cn: 他在那次撞车事件中因头骨碎裂而死去.

sentences.en: He had already clipped his hair close to the skull.
sentences.cn: 他已经把头发剪得贴头皮了。

sentences.en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentences.en: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

sentences.en: Her skull was crammed with too many thoughts.
Nothing was your own except the few cubic centimetres inside your skull.
sentences.cn: 一切的一切,再也不属于你啦——除去脑壳里区区几立方厘米的空间,那还算得上你的领地.
一颗子弹打穿了他的头颅。

sentences.en: Skull and crossbones stickers on the drums aroused the suspicion of the customs officers.
sentences.cn: 这些桶上贴着的骷髅标志引起了海关官员的怀疑。

sentences.en: The butt of a rifle had been used to bash in his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨是被来复枪的枪托砸伤的。

sentences.en: The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five.
The slight back and forth motion sent a pounding surge of pain into his skull.
sentences.cn: 轻微的前后晃动让他的脑袋感到一阵剧烈的疼痛。

sentences.en: With a small gesture the officer indicated the skull - faced man.
sentences.cn: 那个军官略一动手,指着那个骷髅头的人.

phrases.phrase: out of one's skull informal 非正式

trans.tran_cn: 颅骨，头盖骨，脑袋，脑子，[冶]渣壳，熔铁上的浮渣
trans.tran_en: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head
